title: Prologue
desc: Royal Navy encounters Ironblood at Denmark Strait

2.name: Suffolk
2.english: Intelligence reports that the Ironblood's newest battleships are set to sail through this area. If we surprise them here, the Queen will surely reward us upon our return!

3.name: Norfolk
3.english: *Sobs* Battleships? Are we really going to be a match for them?

4.name: Norfolk
4.english: The water here is so cold... My entire body feels like it's turning into ice... Why don't we just hurry back to port?

5.name: Suffolk
5.english: It's going to be fine! We're just here to scout. If a fight kicks off, it'll be up to our big sisters to handle it. They're close by and ready to provide support whenever we need it~!

6.name: Suffolk
6.english: All I see is fog and ice... I don't think anyone else is around. Plus, no matter what battleship appears, they'll turn tail and run once they find out that our big sisters are here, haha!

7.name: Norfolk
7.english: Something feels strange though, don't you think? I'd be relieved if we just spent the rest of our day looking out to sea and then heading home for dinner...

8.name: Norfolk
8.english: Hmm? Wait a second... My radar seems to be picking up a strange signal up ahead...

10.name: Suffolk
10.english: Ironblood destroyer squadron detected ahead! Maybe it's just a few scouts? Report to Hood immediately!

11.name: Norfolk
11.english: My... my antenna is... f-f-frozen into... a p-p-popsicle...

12.name: Suffolk
12.english: We've got to hold off their squadron. It's just a few production-type destroyers... We should be able to handle this!

13.name: Norfolk
13.english: Are... are we going to fight? *Sobs* I knew this would happen...

2.name: Norfolk
2.english: Wow, Suffolk! We're so strong! We defeated so many enemies at the same time!

3.name: Suffolk
3.english: Don't get cocky... Those ships were clearly there to test us... We haven't even seen the Ironblood's new battleship yet. I've got a bad feeling about this...

4.english: Hehehe... So there was an ambush after all! Looking for us?

5.name: Suffolk
5.english: Danger!!! Enemies at starboard!!! Two large warships detected at 220 degrees... New Ironblood battleship spotted! All personnel, get ready to fight!

7.english: Haha~! Two puny cruisers? Getting ready to attack? Hah! I suppose I'll try to enjoy this as much as I can~!

8.name: Hood
8.english: Not just two cruisers! Hood and Prince of Wales from the Royal Navy, here for backup! Let's have a showdown, shall we?

3.name: Hood
3.english: You've done well. It's time for us to give the Ironblood a taste of their own medicine. Target Bismarck, their lead ship! Fire!

4.name: Bismarck ??
4.english: "The Glory of the Royal Navy"? This should be fun. I wonder if you're actually strong enough to satisfy me.

2.name: Bismarck ??
2.english: You've got quite the firepower, but it's useless against me!

2.name: Prince of Wales
2.english: All ships, focus fire on the ship hiding in the back. That's Bismarck, our target!

3.name: Prinz Eugen
3.english: We've been figured out... To be expected from King George V, I suppose...

4.name: Prince of Wales
4.english: Excuse me, but I'm Prince of Wales... You're mistaken me for someone else.

5.name: Prinz Eugen
5.english: Who cares, all you sisters look the same to me. Let's see what you've got!

6.name: Bismarck
6.english: Well, it seems like a fight is inevitable. Jot Dora!

3.name: Hood
3.english: Ah... This power... extraordinary... Incredible that you've found this strength...

4.name: Bismarck
4.english: We've been found out. Eugen, it's time to retreat.

5.name: Prinz Eugen
5.english: Oh? We've got the upper hand! Why would we turn back now?

6.name: Bismarck
6.english: Our secret weapon has been discovered. Dragging this out will only expose us further. Follow my orders and retreat immediately!

7.name: Prinz Eugen
7.english: Damn... So there's no helping it... Take care, little sheep. We'll be seeing you again.

8.name: Hood
8.english: ... Why... why would you betray our alliance...

10.name: Bismarck
10.english: Honor and loyalty... Only with great power can we truly save humanity. We've... we've just chosen a different path.

11.name: Bismarck
11.english: I don't expect you to understand. Only those looking back on these moments will be able to decide who is right and who is wrong.

12.name: Bismarck
12.english: My old friend... May we meet in Valhalla...

14.english: ... Humanity is such an interesting lifeform... The power we gave them was just the beginning... History has already begin to be rewritten...

15.english: Let's continue our observations for some time... I have great expectations for their future developments...

16.english: If we didn't take these steps, coming back to this era would have been meaningless, no? Ahaha...

17.english: The world order is crumbling... Those with power mush stand up and fight against the currents of evil and the torrents of history.

18.english: It is known, however, that power begets power, bringing forth even stronger waves...
